@Jhj Mans just wrote an whole ass essay on this hentai website, Such an inspiration

Writing essays. Saddest decision in my life. Criticize my writing, the only way I have to express myself. I respect the opinion of complete strangers, fellows to the salvation light. I suck at talking, drawing and having something in common with people. But if you could say some kind words I would appreciate it deep down in my heart. We sharing the love of androginity, the purest of loves.

My error was excluding the shit tag. And when I finally clicked the portrait of the Holy Grail, I read what my past depressed being, who was hurting himself with the trauma tags left for me, as a gift in my memory, the faint glimpse of a good story with good art. After all this time, I returned to my roots, to where I parted from this journey, to the pastland, to a maybe happier place. And I said and don’t quote me, “WHAT THE FUCK”

It would take time. But even knowing the pleasure i would get by my occasional success, the idea instant gratification was more attractive. After searching with all the tags excluded, I went to the info panel of nhentai. Time when it was uploaded? Prob a couple of years. Now hit that search button and will find it. Didn’t find it. Oh well o’well. Maybe there was a mistake somewhere. And there I found it. Finally in the screen I saw the biggest error with the guidance of God I could made. The screen went dark after the minute I was deep in my thoughts, wondering if I was finally sleeping. Not today. Where was my error? The mind break tag? Ntr no it’s plain rape. lolicon? No no no… What is certain? Two years tag, uploaded:2y, and the~! The ANIME SHIT PARODY THING! So it was an arduous task. Both of the love “things” had tomboys. But I made it. I finally succeeded. Tags were: -twintails -lolicon idolmaster -shotacon uploaded:>2y -Chinese pages:>15 pages:<44 rape -yaoi -snuff -gore .

0uroboro5 I’ll tell you about my odyssey. So I was thinking in my daily routine of being an asocial doing nothing productive, “Remember that doujin that was well drawn and end end up with the girl cutting herself?” “Yes” “How did it end like?”. So I started my search. The first step was to think about the clues I had. Remember name? No. Tags? It was a tomboy without the tomboy tag. And some anime shit with love something parody. I’m this particular case, I’d like to quote Sherlock Holmes “When you have eliminated all which is impossible, then whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.” and the missile who knows where it is because it knows where it isn’t. Excluding tags was easy -lolicon and BANG half of the site is death. -Japanese and -Chinese for the other half to disappear. -shotacon and -yaoi and -tomgirl did another substantial percentage, but still, there were more than a couple thousands. As someone who has gone through thousands of digits searching for nothing,
Thanks jhl

Yesterday thought randomly about all the shit I’ve seen. Remembered a tomboy that killed here self after bullying. Idk why it’s stuck in my memory. After 2hours of searching, found it. It’s #294196. Thanks traps for saving me from that hell, with the unusual wholesomeness you bring into this website.
Fucking wholesome af, kanata and takkun are just so fking cute together godammit
When I fab to this i'm thinking "Am I bisexual?"  but when i finished this i'm still hetero lol but didn't regret that, i'm just thinking that his dick is just for decoration with white stuff.

Traps saved me from looking at numbers like #116737, the nise dragon blood series, brownsing nhentai for the rape, humiliation and blackmail tags. Traps are a holy sanctuary, free from the evil “Eves”. Fuck the sick people who like pregnant tags, they will be the future’s only hope. God i should start a bible? Isn’t there apostles who write whatever they want? Why I’m still wasting time commenting? Why won’t I delete my account?

Damn i thought they were finally gonna confess to eachoter...

local news "man becomes based"

God I just want a relationship with someone “cute”, no matter who is it. I fking spent 30 minutes writing all of this. Also you are gay if you felt aroused by this cause you were hard by some depiction drawn by the hand of a man

And I will see you, comrade, in the land where there’s no gender, where citizens are tied to laws deeply carved in our genetics, a land love is present, the land of the androgynity, the land of freedom. I will welcome you, my partner

Few in this peaceful era know what’s to chase freedom, and what’s more free than to chase after your sexuality, away from the gears of nature, seeking an impossible dream? What spells more freedom than wanking your dick to hipothetical situations, born of the mind and pen of an artist and storyteller, in a Far East cartoon style? What’s free-er than loving what’s cute, away from the eyes of society?

And there’s the wholesome of these stories, 10/10, reintroduced me to nhentai, the land of inflation, a shit place, the place where women have meat (like Venezuela) I had no doubts about sexuality, but now I’d like to say I’ll have any relationship with anyone who’s leaning into the feminine part of the balance of “feminine-andro-masculine”.

You see humans having things they are not supposed to are uncomfortable *cough* futa *cough* and two manly bodybuilders in bed… not interested thanks BUT trap porn, an affeminated man or as I like to say, androgynous body with a penis is interesting…
I saw in trap porn a new light, illuminating my head, seeing in the now irradiating space that was my head the answer, I was here for wholesomeness

And understanding and accepting in these ages you’d never get a healthy relationship with any w*men, and less with any men, you are going to come to this deadlock: “what I was doing in that website for eight hours a day seeing depressing shit?” And “why am here for, if not fap?”

I think I’ve understanded the purpose of life. You see, normal sex is usually tied to the wish you want a kid together,  and thus there’s so many “wholesome, pure relationships…”. Their counterparts, the “rape, guro, scat…” that were created by spite of “the need to reproduction”, were born out of the pressure of the need to reproduction, and depicts acts against it (rape is you being maddened by the voices, and closing the sad loop by being realized your sexuality in jail. Scat and gore self explanatory)
